title: Fish barrel

The barrel is able to store a combined total of 28 raw fish of any type except for harpoonfish, stackable fish, and trophy fish. Players can right-click to open the barrel, which will have raw fish that the player picks up or fish be automatically placed inside the barrel, providing there is space for it. SMW Subobject for ClosedExamine: Like stashing fish in a barrel.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Fish barrelUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Fish barrel.pngWeight: 1.390Value: 720Version anchor: ClosedRelease date: 24 March 2021Item ID: 25582

The fish barrel is an item that can be obtained from the reward pool in the Ruins of Unkah after defeating Tempoross. The barrel is able to store a combined total of 28 raw fish of any type except for harpoonfish, stackable fish, and trophy fish. Players can right-click to open the barrel, which will have raw fish that the player picks up or fish be automatically placed inside the barrel, providing there is space for it. Players can check the contents of the barrel by selecting the "Check" right-click option, which tells the amount and type of raw fish the player has inside.

When the barrel is full, players can only empty it at a bank or a bank deposit box, similar to looting bags; for Ultimate Ironmen, fish can be withdrawn by using the barrel on an appropriate bank stand. When this occurs, players will get a message in the chatbox stating: "The barrel is full. It may be emptied at a bank."

Upon death to an NPC, the barrel will drop to the ground with all of its contents still stored. If killed by a player killer within the Wilderness, it is considered a valuable item that will be kept if the player is not skulled. This makes the fish barrel especially useful if fishing dark crabs from the Resource Area, as any fish stored in the barrel will be kept on death and denied to potential player killers.

Players can combine the barrel with a fish sack to create the fish sack barrel, which is an equippable version of the fish barrel. There is no confirmation message when this occurs, but it can be split apart by selecting the "Dismantle" option after right-clicking "Configure".

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

Stackable fish can no longer be stored in the fish barrel.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is a reference to the idiom "like shooting fish in a barrel".

The barrel is able to store a combined total of 28 raw fish of any type except for [[raw harpoonfish|harpoonfish]], stackable fish, and trophy fish. Players can right-click to open the barrel, which will have raw fish that the player picks up or fish be automatically placed inside the barrel, providing there is space for it. Players can check the contents of the barrel by selecting the "Check" right-click option, which tells the amount and type of raw fish the player has inside. When the barrel is full, players can only empty it at a bank or a [[bank deposit box]], similar to [[looting bag]]s; for [[Ultimate Ironman|Ultimate Ironmen]], fish can be withdrawn by using the barrel on an appropriate [[Bank|bank stand]]. When this occurs, players will get a message in the chatbox stating: "''The barrel is full. It may be emptied at a bank.''" Upon death to an NPC, the barrel will drop to the ground with all of its contents still stored. If killed by a [[player killer]] within the [[Wilderness]], it is considered a valuable item that will be kept if the player is not [[Skull (status)|skulled]]. This makes the fish barrel especially useful if fishing [[dark crabs]] from the [[Resource Area]], as any fish stored in the barrel will be kept on death and denied to potential player killers. Players can combine the barrel with a [[fish sack]] to create the [[fish sack barrel]], which is an equippable version of the fish barrel.
